resources.string: This app will add CACert.org root certificates to system trusted certificates. Therefore it requires root access to your device.\n\nAfter the process has completed, you should reboot your device.

This app is released under GPL (see http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html)
You can find the source code at the projectâ€™s website: http://cacertinstaller.sieke.it.

If you encounter any problems, you can file a ticket under http://cacertinstaller.sieke.it/issues or send an email to cacertinstaller@sieke.it.
